properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 7:36PM CST until January 16 at 12:45PM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois...
Indiana...

Embarras River at Ste. Marie affecting Crawford and Jasper Counties
Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County
Little Wabash River below Clay City affecting Clay and Richland
Counties
Vermilion River near Danville affecting Vermilion and Vermillion
Counties

.The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil
moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Embarras River at Ste. Marie.
* From late Saturday night until Thursday January 16.
* At  645 PM Thursday the stage was 3.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 19.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Sunday morning and
continue to rise to near 22.8 feet by Monday evening.The river will
fall below flood stage by Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 21.0 feet...Water overtops a few private levees in the
Ste. Marie area.
properties.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternate
route. Turn around, don't drown.

Additional river and weather information is available at
www.weather.gov/ilx.
